Traits.Name: Gran Diaga
Traits.Description: At the start of the arch priest's turn, cure all adjacent allies.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Great Holy
Actions.Effect: Foes inside are branded. Branded foes must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Seal
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become unable to use attack abilities until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take fray damage and are blighted instead.

Actions.Name: Immaculate
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 becomes Intangible until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Gran Redempta
Actions.Description: All defeated allies in range 3 are returned to combat, with 25% hp. They can act as normal starting with the next round.
